alert.note: Alert for Southern Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 15 at 4:19PM EDT until September 17 at 5:00AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...A reasonable worst case of 1 to locally 2 ft of inundation above ground level expected in vulnerable areas near the waterfront and shoreline. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Southern Fairfield, Southern New Haven, Southern Middlesex and Southern New London Counties. In New York, Southern Westchester County. * WHEN...From 7 PM Friday to 5 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in the most vulnerable locations near the waterfront and shoreline. As much as 1 to 2 feet of inundation above ground level is possible, which will cause shallow flooding on some roads and low lying property including parking lots, parks, lawns and homes/businesses with basements near the waterfront. * FORECAST CHALLENGES...There is still uncertainty in the timing of peak surge relative to the times of high tide Tonight into Saturday, the magnitude of wave setup effects over several tidal cycles, and the fact that Lee is expected to transition to an extra- tropical storm. For this reason, this coastal flood forecast represents a reasonable worst case forecast, to include a safety margin for preparation. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. STAMFORD HARBOR AT STAMFORD CT MLLW CATEGORIES - MINOR 9.3 FT, MODERATE 10.9 FT, MAJOR 12.3 FT MHHW CATEGORIES - MINOR 1.5 FT, MODERATE 3.1 FT, MAJOR 4.5 FT TOTAL TOTAL DEPARTURE DAY/TIME TIDE TIDE FROM NORM WAVES FLOOD FT MLLW FT MHHW FT FT IMPACT -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 16/01 AM 9.5/10.0 1.7/ 2.2 1.9/ 2.3 1 MINOR 16/01 PM 9.5/10.0 1.7/ 2.2 1.6/ 2.0 1 MINOR 17/01 AM 7.8/ 8.4 0.1/ 0.6 0.4/ 0.9 1 NONE 17/01 PM 8.1/ 8.6 0.2/ 0.8 0.1/ 0.6 1 NONE BRIDGEPORT HARBOR AT BRIDGEPORT CT MLLW CATEGORIES - info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
